metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0865 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Reachable Assertion in tiffcp in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 5e180045.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0865` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-1ubuntu0.1').
